definitions.definition: (specifically, of an egg) Fried with the yolk unbroken.
definitions.example: He always ate his eggs fried, never scrambled.

definitions.definition: Cooked in a deep fryer or pressure fryer or the like after being coated (breaded) in batter; compare deep-fried.
(of computer equipment) Broken as a result of excessive heat or an electrical surge.
definitions.example: It looks like your motherboard is fried.

definitions.definition: Stoned; under the influence of drugs
definitions.example: Man, I got totally fried on weed at Chad's party.'

definitions.definition: Extremely tired due to exertion or stress; exhausted
definitions.example: After nearly twelve hours at the office plus a nightmare commute home, I was fried and couldn’t think of anything but sleep.

definitions.definition: To be affected by extreme heat or current.
